column4: I am running Ubuntu 10.10. When I boot my computer, gdm does not start. I am able to login using tty1, start/stop/restart gdm but no gui is shown when I switch to tty7. what could possibly be wrong? running startx from tty1 doesn't prove successful either. i also tried booting to recovery mode and run "fail safe" mode but nothing happens. it just says "standby one minute while the display restarts" but does nothing.
add   -exec mv {} /destination/path/ \;  to the end of the command
was that for me? add -exec mv?
